name: Fail an inference unit with too-low recall for a sub model

steps.name: And evaluation criteria for multilabel classification sub model genre-prediction with precision gt 0.2 for class Action
And evaluation criteria for multiclass classification sub model brightness-prediction with recall gt 0.9
And metrics computed from the inference results
When we apply evaluation criteria to the computed metrics
Then a failed result indicating that one or more criteria failed is computed

fullName: I want to apply custom evaluation criteria to metrics computed from sub models of the inference unit: Fail an inference unit with too-low recall for a sub model
